body: There are so many good lolicon collections like these But why are is it so hard to find good milf collections. All are just mmf , ugly bastard, NTR and sh*t like that. All i'm searching for is a gud incest like Mom-son, aunt-nephew, neighbor milf-shotacon. It's fine if it's cliche to me, but still hard to find.

Do I think reading this is worth eternal damnation in the fiery pits of hell?

YOU'RE GODDAMN RIGHT I DO!
lol, anyone noticed the plushie with death

If someone knows a certain loli series wherein the lil sis visits his bro who is a mad scientist for some reason, drugged her, then she was strapped in a sex machine.
